Money flow in #Crypto  1. Fiat (e.g. USD, EUR, GBP)  2. #Bitcoin  3. Large Cap Altcoins (e.g. $ETH, $LTC)   4. Mid Cap Altcoins  5. Low Cap Altcoins  6. $BTC again  7. Fiat   Recognise which market phase we are in & plan where to put your capital in next
